verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] be in Las Vegas on Saturday to headline the Nevada Republican Party 's convention and appear at a fundraiser with Nevada Republican Sen. Dean Heller .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: in Las Vegas] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARGM-PRP: to headline the Nevada Republican Party 's convention and appear at a fundraiser with Nevada Republican Sen. Dean Heller] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] will be in Las Vegas on Saturday to [V: headline] [ARG1: the Nevada Republican Party 's convention] and appear at a fundraiser with Nevada Republican Sen. Dean Heller .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump] will be in Las Vegas on Saturday to headline the Nevada Republican Party 's convention and [V: appear] [ARGM-LOC: at a fundraiser with Nevada Republican Sen. Dean Heller] .
